body: Josh writes about the project he is working on in Swaziland: "Basically, my office operates 4 Social Centers in my town. There are 6 wards but only 4 Social Centers. The basic duties of the Social Centers are first it is a pre-school that operates during regular school days, second is a base for the Caregivers."

The basic duties of the Social Centers are first it is a pre-school that operates during regular school days, second is a base for the Caregivers."
title: Swaziland: My work with social centers

sentence: Josh writes about the project he is working on in Swaziland: "Basically, my office operates 4 Social Centers in my town.
There are 6 wards but only 4 Social Centers.
The basic duties of the Social Centers are first it is a pre-school that operates during regular school days, second is a base for the Caregivers."
